page.title: 15Camping Out
page.content: ONE YEAR WHEN I WAS SEVEN MY MAM BOUGHT US A TENT AND WE STILL HAVE IT TODAY AND LAST YEAR WE CAMPED OUT (THAT MEANS SLEEPING IN IT,) THE TENT IS A TWO MAN TENT AND CAN HOLD ABOUT SEVEN YOUNG PEOPLE.LAST YEAR ME (IAN DARBY,) PAUL D,GRAHAM D,JUSTIN B,GRAHAM B,JOHN H. AND WAYNE B. AND I THINK THAT IS ALL, WE HAVE A FLY NET TO STOP THE RAIN GOING THROUGH AND SOAKING YOU.THE TENT IS MADE NYLON AND WE ARE GOING O CAMP OUT THIS YEAR WITHOUT GRAHAM BELL BECAUSE HE HAS HIS OWN TENT NOW AND WHEN WE WERE CAMPING OUT LAST YEAR WE TOOK CAKES,SANDWICHES,POP AND CRISPS AND WE TOOK MONEY FOR THE FISH SHOP WHERE I GOT FRIED RICE AND CURRY AND WE HAD A MIDNIGHT SNACK. IAN DARBY.
